snippet.title: Astora's Theme
snippet.description:
Astora's Theme, introductory music to the visual novel "Evernight." 
You can download this game for free at itch.io:
https://frozenstar.itch.io/evernight
Story: Welcome to the Night Realm, one of the seven magical realms of Faery and home to the lunar fae... and to a human girl called Astora. Raised from infancy by the Folk, the Night Realm and faerie ways are all she has ever known. Until now...
